job.title: Principal Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
An award winning, Austin based organization are looking for a Principal Machine Learning Engineer join their growing team of experienced Data professionals. The company offer a talent platform that helps companies to be matched with skilled workers. The right candidate is likely to have 3+ years' commercial experience as well as a strong academic background from a top University.


Required skills & experience:

  • Educated to Bachelors degree level or higher from top university
  • 3+ years' commercial experience in ML or Data Science position
  • Extensive Machine Learning experience
  • Experience with Big Data technologies
  • Programming: Python, SQL, Scala, Java


The client is not currently in a position to sponsor or transfer visa's, so please only apply if you have full rights to work in the US without restriction.
